description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. A bomb has been planted in the basement of a building in the middle of the city. When it goes off toxic gas will be released in the air. If you don't successfully funnel the gas through 23 floors to the roof, where a disposal unit will destroy the gas, thousands of people will die.
description.short: A bomb has been planted in the basement of a building in the middle of the city. When it goes off toxic gas will be released in the air. If you don't successfully funnel the gas through 23 floors to the roof, where a disposal unit will destroy the gas, thousands of people will die.
